## IModuleMinifierPluginOptions interface

Options to the ModuleMinifierPlugin constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IModuleMinifierPluginOptions
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                  | Modifiers | Type                                                    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [minifier](./webpack5-module-minifier-plugin.imoduleminifierpluginoptions.minifier.md)    |           | [IModuleMinifier](./module-minifier.imoduleminifier.md) | Minifier implementation to use. Required.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [sourceMap?](./webpack5-module-minifier-plugin.imoduleminifierpluginoptions.sourcemap.md) |           | boolean                                                 | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to enable source map processing. If not provided, will attempt to guess based on <code>mode</code> and <code>devtool</code> in the webpack config. Set to <code>false</code> for faster builds at the expense of debuggability. |
